ygData.subject: Re: Boat Crashes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My bet is that you were on a boat that was rather full 15+ people on it...they have been having a problem with this happening and are working on a fix..the
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:01 AM 6/14/99 -0500, you wrote:
> The first time I was back on the dock in BB then next time on the
>boat on the way to BB and then finally on the boat on the way to Freeport.
> My gut is that there is no relation between the two -
>and this is yet another myth (like all bard songs will require mana!)
>Slyde of Xegony


My bet is that you were on a boat that was rather full 15+ people on
it...they have been having a problem with this happening and are working on
a fix..the bard causing the crash is laughable...If this happens to you
first petition and have everyone on the boat do so as well..the more the
quicker the response...I've had this happen a few times and each time a gm
came and teled us all to our destination.
